title: Poll: Trump's own voters begin blaming him for affordability crisis
description: Americans continue to say affordability is out of control, and they place the responsibility on Trump, The POLITICO Poll found.
content: Americans continue to say affordability is out of control, and they place the responsibility on Trump, The POLITICO Poll found.
